meanings.definition: The act of discoloring or the state of being discolored.
meanings.sent1: The discolorations on the wall were caused by water damage.
meanings.sent2: She noticed discolorations on her favorite shirt after washing it with bleach.
meanings.sent3: The discolorations on the banana made it look like a zebra!
meanings.sent4: The discolorations on the canvas added a sense of mystery to the painting.
meanings.sent5: The discolorations on the leaves made them stand out in the garden.

meanings.definition: Marks or patches of discoloration on something.
meanings.sent1: The discolorations on the carpet were difficult to remove.
meanings.sent2: The discolorations on the old photograph made it hard to see the faces clearly.
meanings.sent3: The discolorations on the cake made it look like a work of art!
meanings.sent4: The discolorations on the sky at sunset painted a beautiful scene.
meanings.sent5: The discolorations on the book cover hinted at its age and history.
